entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain mixed with rain early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
